healthyr 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Bed Availability in Northern Ireland

ni_beds.Rd

A dataset containing hospital statistics on bed availability, bed occupancy and inpatients data.

Usage

ni_beds

Format

A data frame with 13,327 rows and 14 variables:

trust18_code

Health and Social Care Trust code

date

Quarter ending date

hospital

Hospital name

programme_of_care

Programme of care

specialty

Specialty

total_available_beds

Total number of available beds

average_available_beds

Average number of available beds

total_occupied_beds

Total number of occupied beds

average_occupied_beds

Average number of occupied beds

total_inpatients

Total number of inpatients

total_day_case

Total number of day cases

elective_inpatient

Number of elective inpatients

non_elective_inpatient

Number of non-elective inpatients

regular_attenders

Number of regular attenders

Source

https://www.health-ni.gov.uk/
